statement.title: Our Commitment to Privacy
paragraphs: Bekaa operates under strict privacy and data protection standards. When you engage with us, your personal and business information is handled with the highest level of confidentiality.

We collect only essential information necessary for our advisory services and never share your data with third parties without explicit consent. All data processing complies with Lei Geral de Proteção de Dados (LGPD) in Brazil and General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) in Europe.
For our full privacy policy or to exercise your data rights, please contact us at privacy@bekaa.eu
